caption.p: Data sources and processing of environmental and socioeconomic factors

tr.td: Mean temperature from 2010 to 2014 (April–November) in each grid
China Meteorological Data Service Center (CMDC, http://data.cma.cn/)
Mean precipitation from 2010 to 2014 (April–November) in each grid
Mean relative humidity from 2010 to 2014 (April–November) in each grid
Mean normalized difference vegetation index (NDVI) from 2010 to 2014 (April–November) in each grid

According to the land use coverage classification system of the Data Center for RESDC, land use data in 2010 were divided into cultivated land, forest land, grass land, water areas, urban land, rural residential areas, other construction land, and unused land. Statistics on the proportion of various land use areas in the grid
Resource and Environmental Science Data Center of the Chinese Academy of Sciences (RESDC, www.resdc.cn)
Summing the population (persons) for each grid based on the 2010 population density data
Summing the gross domestic product (GDP) values (RMB) for each grid based on the 2010 GDP data
Summing the road density (km/km 2) for each grid based on the road network data in 2010
